ğŸ¾Golf Link is a scenic nature trail that runs from junction of Rifle Range Link and Sime Track, all the way to Lornie Road, passing Jelutong Tower, Zohan Pump Room, SICC Golf course, and end of Lornie Trail.
ğŸ‘£Running close to the reservior's water edge, the trail trek through varied terrains from forested area, to open ground, golf course and water body.
ğŸ¾There are no washroom along the Golf Link.
ğŸ‘£It can get very hot on sunny weather when at open ground.
ğŸ¾Take care to hydrate.
Scenic trail by the Keppel Club. Mostly flat and easy to walk. Just a bit long especially if you came from Treetop. Stay hydrated
